pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Cauchy-Cacoullos (Discrete Cauchy) Distribution // Maximum likelihood estimation of the Cauchy-Cacoullos (discrete Cauchy) distribution. Probability mass, distribution and quantile function are also included. The reference paper is: Papadatos N. (2022). "The Characteristic Function of the Discrete Cauchy Distribution in Memory of T. Cacoullos". Journal of Statistical Theory Practice, 16(3): 47. doi:10.1007/s42519-022-00268-6.
